column1: Quellë was the Quenya name for the season of "fading"
column3: also called Lasse-lanta or "leaf-fall". In Sindarin
column4: this season was called Firith; or Narbeleth
column5: which meant "sun-waning". In the Reckoning of Rivendell it was the fourth of the six "seasons"
column6: and corresponded more or less to the 54 days between 7 October and 30 November in the Shire Calendar.
